transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Ji good evening Amit baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se aapka account manager.
Customer: Umar ji baat boliye.
Executive: Haan bolo.
Executive: Ji Umar ji last week aapke sir dekh raha tha na by lead aapke waiting aapne sir use karna shuru kiya?
Customer: Kya order nahi aa raha hai isme.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Order nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Bilkul to dekhiye sir samajh sakta hu ki sir abhi ye order nahi aa rahe hai but maine aapko bataya tha na ki aapko sir by lead by lead to consume karna start karna padega na that aap jo hai agar ek week me ek bhi by lead nahi lenge to sir aapke paas call to aa jayega jaisa pata hai aapka WhatsApp sab jagah.
Executive: Dekhiye agar sir mai yes sir aapke liye.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul maafi chahunga sir us cheez ke liye but mai jaise check kar pa raha hu to aapne is week me to sir abhi koi by lead nahi consume kiya hai to offline me bechte hai ya time nahi de pa rahe hai.
Customer: Ek minute haan.
Executive: Ye ye account jo hai aap sambhalte hai ya koi aur bhi sambhalta hai?
Customer: Nahi hum hi hum hi sambhalta hu.
Executive: Aap hi sambhalte hai to dekhiye by lead consume kijiye daily update sir do do by lead maine aapse bola tha na ki do by lead kam se kam apni thodi relevancy ki check karni hai.
Executive: Check karke unhe sir consume karna hai unse baat karna hai ek ek tarika rehta hai na sir dekhiye agar aap maan lijiye shop aapne open kiya hai but aap haan open karne ke baad customer se connect nahi kar rahe to business nahi aayega na aise right.
Executive: To mera concern yahi hai ki sir daily basis pe by lead jo aa rahi hai kyuki usse sir ek pattern banega aapka right pattern banega to aapke paas aur nayi by lead aayengi maan lijiye agar aap ek hafte tak koi by lead nahi lete hai to by lead ka flow bhi kam ho jata hai.
Executive: Thik hai jo pattern aapka bana hua hai IndiaMART pe vo bhi kharab ho jata hai.
Executive: Aur calls calls vagera attend kijiye calls bhi sir aap calls me bhi call attend kar dete hai call khali se call aate hai call nahi call na dekhiye mai bata deta hu na use karne se kya sabse jyada loss hoga ye ki aapka product jo hai niche chala jayega ye sabse bada loss hai ki aisa nahi hai ki IndiaMART sirf aapne matlab dekhiye mai aisa bolna nahi chah raha hu magar mai ek baat batana chah raha hu ki aapne agar IndiaMART liya hai to fir use use karna padega aapko right use use karna padega us par thoda dhyan thoda sa to dhyan sir dena padega dekhiye mai aapki madad ke liye baitha hu bilkul magar by lead consume karna calls aapko receive karna ye aapko aur dekhiye by lead agar consume karenge to calls badh jayenge inquiries badhengi lead to generate honi shuru hongi to business automatic aayega right.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Mera samjhane ka sir sirf yahi purpose hai main jo hai aapka ki aapka IndiaMART pe samay kam ho gaya hai matlab aap ek ghante me agar 5 minute bhi dete hai IndiaMART ko 10 minute bhi dete hai jisme 10 minute me aap by lead section me aaiye by lead check kijiye jo by lead aapke lagta hai ki haan ye thik hai aapke regarding usse connect kijiye.
Executive: Jyada se jyada kya hoga jyada se jyada vo customer mana kar dega right magar agar aapne ek hafte tak kiya ek hafte me ek deal bhi aapki ho gayi to business nikalna shuru ho jayega right mai ye nahi keh raha hu Umar ji Umar ji aapko aap maan lijiye aapko do do mahine hua Umar ji.
Executive: Bilkul dekhiye do mahine hue samajh sakta hu do mahine hua do mahine me vo jo factory wale aate hai chakki factory wale.
Customer: Hmm hmm bilkul thik hai mujhe chaliye mujhe ye bataiye aapne do mahine me kitne customer se abhi tak current me connect kiya hai kitne customer se baat kari aapne?
Customer: Do mahine me 60 din 60 din me saat aath customer hai pure factory wale se mujhe aisa aap pure unki bhi factory hai vaisa dalte the vo.
Executive: Hmm hmm dekhiye agar saat aath customer saat aath customer se connect hua hai usi jagah aapka 20 customer se connect hua hota to 20 me se ek sir ek to lead convert hoti na ek convert hoti to business dekhiye aapko bhi pata hai ki sir isme kya hai agar ek mahine me aap ek bhi lead convert kar dete hai to aapko business aise hi nikalne lag jayega 12 mahine hai 12 leads hai 12 leads to convert ho hi jayengi IndiaMART by lead me aap aap jo kaun sa dalna hai by lead me by lead me aap jo do not deal in this duster ko hai kaun sa dalna hai isme I don't know kaun sa dalna hai isme.
Executive: Usme dal dijiye agar aap us product me deal nahi kar rahe hai product hi alag hai to I do not deal in this specific product just remove by lead only just remove by lead only aur agar haan agar aapko lag raha hai ki keyword jo hai thoda related hai aapke to usme dal dijiye just only remove this by lead bus right aur maine aapse ek aur cheez boli thi karne ke liye ki aap vo city ye not preferred location me do char state to city dal dijiye jisse ye rahega ki aap isme deal hi nahi karte hai to uski lead a uski lead aana band ho jayengi aapke paas right jisme mainly aap deal karte hai unki lead consume karna shuru kijiye.
Executive: Thik hai sir dekhiye sir aap mai bas aapse yahi matlab yahi meri request rahegi ki ek din me agar aap ek customer se bhi connect kar pa rahe hai ya ek hafte me mai keh raha hu ek customer se bhi connect kar pa rahe hai char hafte hote hai char customer se connect char me se ek se deal aap right to Hyderabad ka hai ek Hyderabad ka hai.
Customer: Ek Hyderabad ka hai isme vo bhi factory wala se.
Executive: Samajh sakta hu dekhiye sir agar vahi vahi to sir sabse bada challenge hai ki business me patience rakhna jaruri hai aur ye to mujhse jyada aap acche se jante honge ki agar char customer aa rahe hai to char me se ek customer hi lene ki guarantee hai 10 customer aa rahe hai 10 me se bhi ek ki ho jati hai thik hai aapko vo customer aap agar customer se baat karna hi band kar denge to sir business nikalna possible nahi hai na hum bhi mai sir aapki puri help karunga isme mai aapke catalog par bhi kaam karunga aapko by lead share jo mujhe important lagegi vo by lead bhi share karunga aapko thik hai aapki pura pura mai aapko help karunga magar is par kaam aapko mere sath karna hoga right ek baar mujhpe vishwas karke dekhiye mai sir is par pura kaam karunga business sir milega aapko thik hai agar baat kare sir services ke liye abhi kafi abhi pura matlab maan lijiye lagbhag 11 10 month hai aapke paas 10 month me to aap kya se kya kar denge right itne saalo se aap IndiaMART ko haan itne time se aap IndiaMART pe trust kar rahe hai thik hai aur kaam karke dekhiye thoda sa sir mai sir business nikal paunga na iska ye meri hai right sir vo Sagar mal se baat kar rahe hai kya aap?
Customer: Nahi nahi mai Amit Sharma baat kar raha hu mai Amit Sharma baat kar raha hu mai abhi aapka new account manager appoint hua hu sir.
Executive: Mera sir mera mainly kaam yahi hai ki sir mai customer ko ye cheez guide karta hu ki vo kam samay me jyada cheeze nikal payega right.
Customer: Tumhara number hai?
Executive: Ji sir mera hi number hai mai aapko number share kar dunga mai aapko abhi aapka apna number share kar deta hu WhatsApp pe thik hai jisse aap mujhse directly connect ho jayenge.
Executive: Aur sir koi tension hai aapka?
Customer: Sir do mahine hua paisa waste ho gaya sir.
Executive: Sir abhi agar agar abhi aap free hai to mai aapko video meet pe connect karke thodi cheeze guide kar du kaise aapko karna hai ye?
Customer: Haan haan guide kar dijiye.
Executive: Haan mai video mai WhatsApp par aapke aisa karta hu WhatsApp pe aapko video meet video call ka bhej raha hu thik hai link jo hai aap connect kijiye usse mai aapko guide karta hu ki kya karna hai aapko thik hai abhi WhatsApp pe bhej raha hu aapke connect connect kijiye ga okay sir thik hai haan mai abhi bhejta hu aapko WhatsApp par mera personal number bhi aa jayega usse aapke paas.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving orders through IndiaMART.

- Feels money is wasted after two months.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of consuming buyleads.

- Executive offered to guide via video call.

- Executive will share his contact number on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to send a video call link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Negative | Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, orders, account management, support
